entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
